behavior prepare_bathtub_and_place_cat(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve open(bathtub)
        # Ensure the bathtub is open for the task
        achieve close_char(char, bathtub)
        # Approach the bathtub
        achieve_once gently_pick_up(cat)
        # Gently pick up the cat Note achieve_once is used to manage the temporary state
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Place cat inside the bathtub

behavior locate_bathtub(bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Confirm the item is a bathtub

behavior fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(bathtub)
        # Fill the bathtub with water

behavior gently_wash_cat(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Place the cat gently into the bathtub
        achieve clean(cat)
        # Clean the cat while inside the bathtub

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat to bathe
        
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select a bathtub

        locate_bathtub(bathtub)
        fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub)
        gently_wash_cat(cat, bathtub)
['1. Bathe the cat in the bathtub.', '2. Use a towel to dry the cat.']

behavior bathe_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub) 
        # Ensure the cat is inside the bathtub
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, bathtub)
        # Bind the faucet that is close to the bathtub
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        # Turn on the faucet to fill the bathtub with water for bathing the cat 

behavior turn_off_faucet(faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(faucet) 
        # Turn off the faucet

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select a bathtub
        bathe_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, bathtub)
        # Ensure the faucet used for the bath is selected
        turn_off_faucet(faucet)
        # Safely turn off the faucet after finishing the bath
